summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of Honeywell US thermostat integration, checking device attributes, heatâ€‘away mode, property handling, retry mechanisms, operation mode changes, temperature setting (including error handling), target temperature reporting, unit of measurement, and scenarios without fan support.
